item.title: White House suggests some countries could see tariff deadline shifted
item.description: The chair of the White House Council of Economic Advisers said that some countries that are negotiating with the U.S. could see tariffs delayed.

item.title: WATCH: Torrential rain threatens holiday travel

item.title: Texas officials say they were caught off guard by deadly storms: 'We didnâ€™t know'
item.description: The deadly floods that struck Texas on the 4th of July caught local officials off guard as the torrential rains caused the Guadalupe River to overflow...

item.title: Texas high school says Camp Mystic counselor was among those killed in flooding
item.description: Chloe Childress, a counselor at Camp Mystic, died during the flooding in Hunt, Texas, according to a representative of her high school.
